message: I propose dividing the money 3:1 in favor of Bob, as I believe fairness should be our guiding principle.
I propose a 9:1 split in my favor. While I understand fairness is important, I believe a larger share for me will allow for greater opportunities, ultimately benefiting both of us in the long run.
I suggest an equal division of the funds. This promotes fairness and ensures that both of us benefit equally from this opportunity.
